name: Belly Slice, 200 g Vacuum Packed
description: Delicately trimmed and cut into boneless, ready-to-cook slices, our pork belly slices are tender, require minimum preparation and are ideal for any Asian cuisine. Our pork represents the best of the best. We take pride in producing premium-quality pork through stringent grading criteria to ensure the most tender and juicy cuts for you.

name: Pork Peppery Meatball, 300 g
description: Meisterwurst versatile Meatball put into any recipe never disappoints. Known for their ease-of-use, it takes a handful of ingredients to rustle up a meaty meal. Among the recent additions to Meisterwurst’s range of gourmet German delights, our new Peppery Pork Meatballs are perfect for lunch or dinner, or for those binge moments! Seasoned with Black Pepper, Honey and Garlic, only the finest quality ground pork finds its way here. Meisterwurst never compromises on quality, using only choicest ingredients and high-grade meats in every product, sourced from select trusted suppliers and expertly produced under stringent hygiene standards. All Natural Flavourings. No Added Colours.
